title: Penelope's progress : being such extracts from the commonplace book of Penelope Hamilton as relate to her experiences in Scotland
creator: Wiggin, Kate Douglas Smith, 1856-1923
Rogers, Bruce, 1870-1957, book designer
publisher: Boston : Houghton, Mifflin and Co. ; Cambridge [Mass.] : Riverside Press
description: Title page and endpaper (with thistle pattern) designed by Bruce Rogers
Cloth over boards, gilt lettering on spine and upper cover
Rare Books copy: Ravenscroft bookplate on front free endpaper
Rare Books copy: Bookplate of Annie Burr Jennings on front pastedown
Rare Books copy: Autograph letter signed Kate Douglas Riggs [Wiggin] to "Dear Miss Jennings," dated May 27 [1898], found hinged to the front free endpaper, has been removed to ALS file
subject: Scotland -- Fiction
references: Work of Bruce Rogers, 33; Haas, I. Bruce Rogers, 17
